trans-unit.source: Provides a customizable activity designer surface for users to visually modify on a workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: Proporciona una superficie del diseñador de actividad personalizable para que los usuarios modifiquen visualmente una superficie de diseño de flujo de trabajo.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner> allows users to modify how an activity appears on a workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner> permite a los usuarios modificar cómo una actividad aparece en una superficie de diseño de flujo de trabajo.

trans-unit.source: When you associate <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner> with a custom activity class using the `Designer` attribute, the custom activity's appearance is different from other activities when a user drops the custom activity onto a design surface.
trans-unit.target: Al asociar <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner> a una clase de actividad personalizada utilizando el atributo`Designer`, el aspecto de la actividad personalizada es diferente de otras actividades cuando un usuario coloca la actividad personalizada en una superficie de diseño.

trans-unit.source: Once <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner> displays an activity on the design surface, users can draw connectors to other activity designers and resize the designer within the parameters defined by the design surface.
trans-unit.target: Cuando <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner> muestra una actividad en la superficie de diseño, los usuarios pueden dibujar conectores a otros diseñadores de actividad y cambiar el tamaño del diseñador dentro de los parámetros definidos por la superficie de diseño.

trans-unit.source: Users can only add connectors to the custom activity because the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner> is associated with the top-level activity in a workflow.
trans-unit.target: Los usuarios sólo pueden agregar conectores a la actividad personalizada porque el <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner> está asociado a la actividad de nivel superior en un flujo de trabajo.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa una nueva instancia de la clase <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets an <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject" /> that accessibility applications use to adjust the application UI for users who have impairments.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject" /> que las aplicaciones de accesibilidad utilizan para ajustar la interfaz de usuario de la aplicación para los usuarios que tienen discapacidades.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject" /> associated with the control.
trans-unit.target: El objeto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject" /> asociado al control.

trans-unit.source: If no `AccessibleObject` is currently assigned to the control, a new instance of one is created.
trans-unit.target: Si no hay ningún `AccessibleObject` asignado al control en la actualidad, se crea una nueva instancia de uno.

trans-unit.source: To get or set the `AccessibilityObject` property, you must add a reference to the Accessibility assembly installed with the .NET Framework.
trans-unit.target: Para obtener o establecer el valor de la propiedad `AccessibilityObject`, se debe agregar una referencia al ensamblado Accesibility instalado con .NET Framework.

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[crabout](~/includes/crabout-md.md)] accessible objects, see the Active Accessibility section of the MSDN Library.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[crabout](~/includes/crabout-md.md)] los objetos accesibles, vea la sección Active Accessibility de la MSDN Library.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint" /> location to begin drawing the connector.
trans-unit.target: Ubicación <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint" /> donde se inicia el dibujo del conector.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint" /> location to finish drawing the connector.
trans-unit.target: Ubicación <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint" /> donde finaliza el dibujo del conector.

trans-unit.source: Adds a connector to the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" />.
trans-unit.target: Agrega un conector a <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector" /> that was added to the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector" /> agregado a <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" />.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AddConnector%2A> is called when a user adds a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector> to the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner>.
trans-unit.target: Se llama a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AddConnector%2A> cuando un usuario agrega <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector> a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner>.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the `AddConnnector` method in a custom activity designer's `OnLayoutPosition` method.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo siguiente se muestra cómo utilizar el método `AddConnnector` en el método `OnLayoutPosition` de un diseñador de actividades personalizadas.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="source" /> or <paramref name="target" /> contains a <see langword="null" /> reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="source" /> o <paramref name="target" /> contiene una <see langword="null" /> referencia (<see langword="Nothing" /> en Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint.AssociatedDesigner" /> property for <paramref name="source" /> or <paramref name="target" /> contains a <see langword="null" /> reference (<see langword="Nothing" />).
trans-unit.target: La propiedad <see cref="P:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint.AssociatedDesigner" /> para <paramref name="source" /> o <paramref name="target" /> contiene una referencia <see langword="null" /> (<see langword="Nothing" />).

trans-unit.source: The current <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" /> is not the container for the connector to add.
trans-unit.target: El <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" /> actual no es el contenedor para que se agregue el conector.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" /> is resized automatically when a user resizes the designer's child designers.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene o establece un valor que indica si <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" /> se cambia automáticamente de tamaño cuando un usuario cambia el tamaño de los diseñadores de elementos secundarios del diseñador.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" /> is resized automatically; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> si <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" /> cambia automáticamente de tamaño; de lo contrario, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: El valor predeterminado es <see langword="true" />.

trans-unit.source: When you set <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSize%2A>, the layout of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner> is updated.
trans-unit.target: Al establecer <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSize%2A>, el diseño de <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner> se actualiza.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the margin size to render around the child designers when the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" /> is automatically resized.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene o establece el tamaño del margen para representar alrededor de los diseñadores secundarios cuando <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" /> se cambia automáticamente de tamaño.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> that represents the size of the margin to render around the child designers of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> que representa el tamaño del margen para presentar alrededor de los diseñadores secundarios de <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" />.

trans-unit.source: The default size of <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSizeMargin%2A> is a <xref:System.Drawing.Size> object with dimensions of 40 pixels by 40 pixels.
trans-unit.target: El tamaño predeterminado de <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSizeMargin%2A> es un objeto <xref:System.Drawing.Size> con dimensiones de 40 píxeles por 40 píxeles.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme.ShowGrid%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property associated with the current workflow theme is set to `true`, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSizeMargin%2A> settings are half the height and half the width of the grid size.
trans-unit.target: Si la propiedad <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme.ShowGrid%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> asociada al tema de flujo de trabajo actual está establecida en `true`, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSizeMargin%2A> los valores tienen la mitad de altura y anchura del tamaño de la cuadrícula.

trans-unit.source: When you set <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSizeMargin%2A>, the layout of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner> is updated.
trans-unit.target: Al establecer <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSizeMargin%2A>, el diseño de <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner> se actualiza.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AutoSizeMode" /> settings for the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene o establece los valores <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AutoSizeMode" /> para <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AutoSizeMode" /> for the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AutoSizeMode" /> para <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" />.

trans-unit.source: The default setting is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.AutoSizeMode.GrowOnly" />.
trans-unit.target: El valor predeterminado es <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.AutoSizeMode.GrowOnly" />.

trans-unit.source: The default behavior of <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSizeMode%2A> allows the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner> to grow as necessary to fit its contents but does not shrink smaller than the value of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.MinimumSize%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: El comportamiento predeterminado de <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSizeMode%2A> permite a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner> crecer lo necesario para rellenar su contenido pero no se vuelve más pequeño que el valor de propiedad <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.MinimumSize%2A>.

trans-unit.source: When you set <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSizeMode%2A>, the layout of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner> is updated.
trans-unit.target: Al establecer <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSizeMode%2A>, el diseño de <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner> se actualiza.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner" /> to bring to the top of the z-order.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner" /> que trae la parte superior del orden Z.

trans-unit.source: Brings the specified <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner" /> to the top of the z-order of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" />.
trans-unit.target: Trae el <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner" /> especificado a la parte superior del orden Z de <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" />.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.BringToFront%2A> modifies the z-order for the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner> to display the specified <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner> as its top visible child designer.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.BringToFront%2A> modifica el orden Z para que <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner> muestre el <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner> especificado como su diseñador secundario visible en la parte superior.

trans-unit.source: You can use this method to display a designer at the top of the z-order when a user selects it.
trans-unit.target: Puede utilizar este método para mostrar un diseñador en la parte superior del orden Z cuando un usuario lo selecciona.

trans-unit.source: `containedDesigner` must be in a child of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner> before you call <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.BringToFront%2A>.
trans-unit.target: El parámetro `containedDesigner` deben ser un elemento secundario de la clase <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner> antes de llamar al método <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.BringToFront%2A>.

trans-unit.source: If it is not, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.BringToFront%2A> throws an <xref:System.ArgumentException>.
trans-unit.target: Si no, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.BringToFront%2A> se produce <xref:System.ArgumentException>.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="containedDesigner" /> contains a <see langword="null" /> reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="containedDesigner" /> contiene una referencia <see langword="null" /> (<see langword="Nothing" /> en Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="containedDesigner" /> is not found in the <see cref="P:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner.ContainedDesigners" /> collection.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="containedDesigner" /> no se encuentra en la colección <see cref="P:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner.ContainedDesigners" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint" /> to check on the source activity designer.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint" /> para comprobar el diseñador de actividad de origen.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint" /> to check on the target activity designer.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint" /> para comprobar el diseñador de actividad de destino.

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" /> can create a connection between the specified connection point on a source child activity designer and the specified connection point on a target child activity designer.
trans-unit.target: Devuelve un valor que indica si <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" /> puede crear una conexión entre el punto de conexión especificado en un diseñador de actividad secundario de origen y el punto de conexión especificado en un diseñador de actividad secundario de destino.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" /> can draw a connector between source and target activity designers; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> si <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" /> puede dibujar un conector entre los diseñadores de actividad de origen y destino; de lo contrario, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" /> can be collapsed on a workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene un valor que indica si <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" /> se puede contraer en una superficie de diseño de flujo de trabajo.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" /> can be collapsed; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> si <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" /> se puede contraer; en caso contrario, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.CanExpandCollapse%2A> always returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.CanExpandCollapse%2A> siempre devuelve `false`.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner" /> to check.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner" /> que se va a comprobar.

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether a user can visually resize the specified child activity designer in the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" />.
trans-unit.target: Devuelve un valor que indica si un usuario puede cambiar visualmente el tamaño del diseñador de actividad secundario especificado en <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" />.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if a user can visually resize the specified activity designer; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> si un usuario puede cambiar visualmente el tamaño del diseñador de actividad especificado; de lo contrario, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Unless overridden in a derived class, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.CanResizeContainedDesigner%2A> returns `true` if `containedDesigner` is a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner>.
trans-unit.target: A menos que se invalide en una clase derivada, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.CanResizeContainedDesigner%2A> devuelve `true` si `containedDesigner` es <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner>.

trans-unit.source: Other types of designers cannot be resized.
trans-unit.target: No se puede cambiar el tamaño de otros tipos de diseñadores.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector" /> is added to the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" />.
trans-unit.target: Se produce cuando se agrega un <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector" /> a <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" />.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.OnConnectorAdded%2A> is the registered delegate event handler for the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.ConnectorAdded> event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.OnConnectorAdded%2A> es el controlador de eventos de delegado registrado para el evento <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.ConnectorAdded>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a user changes the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint" /> locations associated with a <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector" /> displayed by the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" />.
trans-unit.target: Se produce cuando un usuario cambia las ubicaciones <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint" /> asociadas a <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector" /> mostradas por <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" />.

trans-unit.source: A connector is changed when a user changes the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint> locations at either end of a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector> object.
trans-unit.target: Se cambia un conector cuando un usuario cambia las ubicaciones del constructor <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint> en cualquier extremo de un objeto <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector>.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.OnConnectorChanged%2A> is the registered delegate event handler for the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.ConnectorChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.OnConnectorChanged%2A> es el controlador de eventos de delegado registrado para el evento <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.ConnectorChanged>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a user removes a connector from the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" />.
trans-unit.target: Se produce cuando un usuario quita un conector de <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" />.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.OnConnectorRemoved%2A> is the registered delegate event handler for the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.ConnectorRemoved> event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.OnConnectorRemoved%2A> es el controlador de eventos de delegado registrado para el evento <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.ConnectorRemoved>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a read-only collection of connectors that are associated with the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene una colección de solo lectura de los conectores asociados a <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" />.

trans-unit.source: A read-only collection that contains all <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector" /> objects associated with the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" />.
trans-unit.target: Una colección de solo lectura que contiene todos los objetos <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector" /> asociados al <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" />.

trans-unit.source: A connector is the line that appears on a workflow design surface that connects one activity designer to another.
trans-unit.target: Un conector es la línea que aparece en una superficie de diseño de flujo de trabajo que conecta un diseñador de actividad a otro.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint" /> location to begin drawing the connector.
trans-unit.target: Ubicación <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint" /> donde se inicia el dibujo del conector.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint" /> location to finish drawing the connector.
trans-unit.target: Ubicación <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint" /> donde finaliza el dibujo del conector.

trans-unit.source: Creates a connector between the two specified connection points.
trans-unit.target: Crea un conector entre los dos puntos de conexión especificados.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector" /> that was created.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector" /> que se ha creado.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the designer is being disposed; <see langword="false" /> if the designer is being finalized.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> si el diseñador se desecha; <see langword="false" /> si el diseñador se finaliza.

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" /> and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: Libera los recursos no administrados que usa <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" /> y, de forma opcional, libera los recursos administrados.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether users can drag and draw connectors on the free-form activity designer surface.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene o establece un valor que indica si los usuarios pueden arrastrar y dibujar los conectores en la superficie del diseñador de actividad de forma libre.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if users can drag and draw connectors on the free-form activity designer surface; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> si los usuarios pueden arrastrar y dibujar los conectores en la superficie del diseñador de actividad de forma libre; de lo contrario, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: El valor predeterminado es <see langword="true" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" /> can be visually resized on the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene un valor que indica si <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" /> se puede cambiar visualmente de tamaño en la superficie de diseño de flujo de trabajo.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" /> can be visually resized; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> si <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" /> se puede cambiar visualmente de tamaño; de lo contrario, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: El valor predeterminado es <see langword="true" />.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSize%2A> is set to `true` and <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSizeMode%2A> is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AutoSizeMode.GrowAndShrink>, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.EnableVisualResizing%2A> returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: Si <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSize%2A> se establece en `true` y <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSizeMode%2A> se establece en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AutoSizeMode.GrowAndShrink>, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.EnableVisualResizing%2A> devuelve `false`.

trans-unit.source: In all other conditions <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.EnableVisualResizing%2A> returns `true`.
trans-unit.target: En todas las demás condiciones <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.EnableVisualResizing%2A> devuelve `true`.

trans-unit.source: Gets the first selectable object in the navigation order of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene el primer objeto seleccionable en el orden de navegación de <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" />.

trans-unit.source: The first selectable object in the navigation order of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" />.
trans-unit.target: El primer objeto seleccionable en el orden de navegación de <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" />.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.FirstSelectableObject%2A> returns the first child designer in the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner.ContainedDesigners%2A> collection, or a `null` reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic) if the collection count is zero.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.FirstSelectableObject%2A> devuelve el primer diseñador de elementos secundarios en la colección <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner.ContainedDesigners%2A> o una referencia `null` (`Nothing` en Visual Basic) si el recuento de la colección es cero.

trans-unit.source: The current <see cref="T:System.Object" /> in the navigation order.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Object" /> actual en el orden de navegación.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerNavigationDirection" /> enumeration value that determines the navigation order of the designer.
trans-unit.target: Valor de enumeración <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerNavigationDirection" /> que determina el orden de navegación del diseñador.

trans-unit.source: Returns the first selectable object that follows the specified object in the navigation order of the current <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" />.
trans-unit.target: Devuelve el primer objeto seleccionable que sigue al objeto especificado en el orden de navegación de la clase <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" /> actual.

trans-unit.source: The first selectable <see cref="T:System.Object" /> that follows the <paramref name="obj" /> parameter in the navigation order.
trans-unit.target: El primer <see cref="T:System.Object" /> seleccionable que sigue al parámetro <paramref name="obj" /> en el orden de navegación.

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of glyphs that are displayed on the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene la colección de glifos que se muestran en <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" />.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerGlyphCollection" /> that contains the glyphs displayed on the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerGlyphCollection" /> que contiene los glifos mostrados en <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" />.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.Glyphs%2A> returns a glyph for each connectable child designer found on the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.Glyphs%2A> devuelve un glifo para cada diseñador secundario conectable situado en <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner>.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> that contains the coordinates on the workflow design surface from which to gather information.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> que contiene las coordenadas en la superficie de diseño de flujo de trabajo de las que recopilar información.

trans-unit.source: Returns information about the <see langword="FreeformActivityDesigner" /> at the specified coordinates on the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: Devuelve información sobre <see langword="FreeformActivityDesigner" /> en las coordenadas especificadas en la superficie de diseño de flujo de trabajo.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo" /> that contains information about the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" /> at the specified coordinates
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo" /> que contiene información acerca de <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" /> en las coordenadas especificadas.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.HitTest%2A> checks whether the location has occurred on a connector or one of the child activity designers.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.HitTest%2A> comprueba si la ubicación se ha producido en un conector o uno de los diseñadores de actividad secundarios.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.HitTest%2A> occurs on a child activity that is being dragged to another location, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.HitTest%2A> returns information about the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner>, not the designer being moved.
trans-unit.target: Si <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.HitTest%2A> se produce en una actividad secundaria que se está arrastrando a otra ubicación, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.HitTest%2A> devuelve información sobre <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner>, no sobre el diseñador que se está moviendo.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> with which to initialize the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> con el que se inicializa <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" /> by using the specified <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" />.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" /> utilizando el <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> especificado.

trans-unit.source: `Initialize` adds a designer property extender to the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner> for it to use until the design surface is destroyed.
trans-unit.target: `Initialize` agrega un extensor de propiedad de diseñador a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner> para que lo utilice hasta que se destruya la superficie de diseño.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo" /> that specifies the location to add the activities.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo" /> que especifica la ubicación donde agregar las actividades.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> read-only collection that contains the activities to add to the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" />.
trans-unit.target: La colección de <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> de solo lectura que contiene las actividades que se van a agregar a la clase <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" />.

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified read-only collection of activities to the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" /> at the specified location on the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: Agrega la colección de solo lectura de actividades especificada a <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" /> en la ubicación especificada en la superficie de diseño de flujo de trabajo.

trans-unit.source: Gets the last selectable object in the navigation order of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene el último objeto seleccionable en el orden de navegación de <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Object" /> that is the last selectable object in the designer navigation order.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Object" /> que es el último objeto seleccionable en el orden de navegación del diseñador.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.LastSelectableObject%2A> returns the last child designer in the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner.ContainedDesigners%2A> property or a `null` reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic) if the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner> does not contain any child designers.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.LastSelectableObject%2A> devuelve el último diseñador secundario en la propiedad <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner.ContainedDesigners%2A> o una referencia `null` (`Nothing` en Visual Basic) si <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner> no contiene ningún diseñador secundario.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the location of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" /> in logical coordinates.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene o establece la ubicación de <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" /> en coordenadas lógicas.

trans-unit.source: A <see langword="Point" /> that represents the location of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" /> in logical coordinates.
trans-unit.target: Un <see langword="Point" /> que representa la ubicación de <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" /> en coordenadas lógicas.

trans-unit.source: When <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.Location%2A> is set due to a user resizing the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner>, the designer maintains the relative positions of its child designers.
trans-unit.target: Cuando <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.Location%2A> se establece debido a un usuario que cambia el tamaño <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner>, el diseñador mantiene las posiciones relativas de sus diseñadores secundarios.

trans-unit.source: Gets the minimum size settings for the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene la configuración del tamaño mínima para <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> that represents the smallest possible size for the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> que representa el tamaño más pequeño posible para <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" />.

trans-unit.source: Location to move activities to.
trans-unit.target: Ubicación a la que se van a mover las actividades.

trans-unit.source: Collection that contains the activities to move to <c>moveLocation.</c>
trans-unit.target: Colección que contiene las actividades que se van a mover a <c>moveLocation</c>.

trans-unit.source: Moves activities to a specified location within the design surface.
trans-unit.target: Mueve las actividades a una ubicación especificada dentro de la superficie de diseño.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner" /> to move.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner" /> que debe moverse.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> that represents the designer's new location.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> que representa la nueva ubicación del diseñador.

trans-unit.source: Moves the specified <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner" /> to the specified location.
trans-unit.target: Mueve la clase <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner" /> especificada a la ubicación especificada.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.MoveContainedDesigner%2A> sets new bounds for the moved designer and performs all required layout operations for the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner> on the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.MoveContainedDesigner%2A> establece los nuevos límites para el diseñador movido y realiza todas las operaciones de diseño necesarias para <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner> en la superficie de diseño de flujo de trabajo.

trans-unit.source: `containedDesigner` must be in a child of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner> before you call <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.MoveContainedDesigner%2A>.
trans-unit.target: El parámetro `containedDesigner` deben ser un elemento secundario de la clase <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner> antes de llamar al método <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.MoveContainedDesigner%2A>.

trans-unit.source: If it is not, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.MoveContainedDesigner%2A> throws an <xref:System.ArgumentException>.
trans-unit.target: Si no, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.MoveContainedDesigner%2A> se produce <xref:System.ArgumentException>.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="containedDesigner" /> contains a <see langword="null" /> reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="containedDesigner" /> contiene una referencia <see langword="null" /> (<see langword="Nothing" /> en Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="containedDesigner" /> is not found in the <see cref="P:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner.ContainedDesigners" /> collection.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="containedDesigner" /> no se encuentra en la colección <see cref="P:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner.ContainedDesigners" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectorEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Objeto <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectorEventArgs" /> que contiene los datos del evento.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.ConnectorAdded" /> event.
trans-unit.target: Genera el evento <see cref="E:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.ConnectorAdded" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectorEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Objeto <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectorEventArgs" /> que contiene los datos del evento.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.ConnectorChanged" /> event.
trans-unit.target: Genera el evento <see cref="E:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.ConnectorChanged" />.

trans-unit.source: A connector is changed when a user changes the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint> locations at either end of a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector> object.
trans-unit.target: Se cambia un conector cuando un usuario cambia las ubicaciones del constructor <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint> en cualquier extremo de un objeto <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector>.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectorEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Objeto <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectorEventArgs" /> que contiene los datos del evento.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.ConnectorRemoved" /> event.
trans-unit.target: Genera el evento <see cref="E:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.ConnectorRemoved" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCollectionChangeEventArgs" /> that contains information about the added or removed activities.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCollectionChangeEventArgs" /> que contiene información sobre las actividades agregadas o eliminadas.

trans-unit.source: Notifies the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" /> when a child activity is added or deleted from its <see langword="Activities" /> collection.
trans-unit.target: Notifica a <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" /> cuando se agrega o elimina una actividad secundaria de su colección <see langword="Activities" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint" /> location to begin drawing the connector.
trans-unit.target: Ubicación <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint" /> donde se inicia el dibujo del conector.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint" /> location to finish drawing the connector.
trans-unit.target: Ubicación <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint" /> donde finaliza el dibujo del conector.

trans-unit.source: Notifies the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" /> when a connection has been established between two of its contained activity designers.
trans-unit.target: Notifica a <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" /> cuando una conexión se ha establecido entre dos de sus diseñadores de actividad contenidos.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.OnContainedDesignersConnected%2A> is called when a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector> is drawn between the source on one of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner> object's contained activity designers to target on a second contained activity designer.
trans-unit.target: Se llama a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.OnContainedDesignersConnected%2A> cuando se dibuja un <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector> entre el origen en uno de los diseñadores de actividades contenidos del objeto <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner> para dirigirse a un segundo diseñador de actividades contenido.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDragEventArgs" /> that defines the operation event arguments.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDragEventArgs" /> que define los argumentos de evento de operación.

trans-unit.source: Notifies the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" /> when a drag-drop operation is completed within the bounds of its design surface.
trans-unit.target: Notifica a <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" /> cuando una operación de arrastrar y colocar se completa dentro de los límites de su superficie de diseño.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDragEventArgs" /> that defines the operation event arguments.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDragEventArgs" /> que define los argumentos de evento de operación.

trans-unit.source: Notifies the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" /> when a drag-drop operation is in progress and the user's mouse cursor is inside the bounds of the designer.
trans-unit.target: Notifica a <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" /> cuando una operación de arrastrar y colocar está en curso y el cursor del mouse del usuario está dentro de los límites del diseñador.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.KeyEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Objeto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.KeyEventArgs" /> que contiene los datos del evento.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a key is pressed when the designer has the keyboard focus.
trans-unit.target: Se produce cuando se presiona una tecla mientras el diseñador tiene el foco del teclado.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerLayoutEventArgs" /> that defines the operation event arguments.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerLayoutEventArgs" /> que define los argumentos de evento de operación.

trans-unit.source: Performs layout tasks to position visual cues and child designers on the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" />.
trans-unit.target: Realiza las tareas de diseño para colocar indicaciones visuales y diseñadores secundarios en <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerLayoutEventArgs" /> that defines the operation event arguments.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerLayoutEventArgs" /> que define los argumentos de evento de operación.

trans-unit.source: Notifies the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" /> when the size of the visual cues on the designers displayed by the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" /> have changed.
trans-unit.target: Notifica a <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" /> cuando el tamaño de las indicaciones visuales en los diseñadores mostrados por <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" /> ha cambiado.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> that represents the new size of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" /> on the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> que representa el nuevo tamaño de <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" /> en la superficie de diseño de flujo de trabajo.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.OnLayoutSize%2A> returns the size of the current bounding rectangle for the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner> when <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSize%2A> is set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.OnLayoutSize%2A> devuelve el tamaño del rectángulo delimitador actual para <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner> cuando <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSize%2A> está establecido en `false`.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSize%2A> is set to `true` and <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSizeMode%2A> is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AutoSizeMode.GrowOnly?displayProperty=nameWithType>, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.OnLayoutSize%2A> calculates and returns new size settings for the bounding rectangle.
trans-unit.target: Si <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSize%2A> está establecido en `true` y <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSizeMode%2A> está establecido en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AutoSizeMode.GrowOnly?displayProperty=nameWithType>, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.OnLayoutSize%2A> calcula y devuelve los nuevos valores de tamaño para el rectángulo delimitador.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSize%2A> is set to true and <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSizeMode%2A> is not set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AutoSizeMode.GrowAndShrink?displayProperty=nameWithType>, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.OnLayoutSize%2A> returns <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.MinimumSize%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Si <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSize%2A> está establecido a verdadero y <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSizeMode%2A> no está establecido en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AutoSizeMode.GrowAndShrink?displayProperty=nameWithType>, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.OnLayoutSize%2A> devuelve <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.MinimumSize%2A>.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerResizeEventArgs" /> that defines the operation event arguments.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerResizeEventArgs" /> que define los argumentos de evento de operación.

trans-unit.source: Notifies the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" /> when a user is visually resizing it at design time.
trans-unit.target: Notifica a <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" /> cuando un usuario está cambiando visualmente su tamaño en tiempo de diseño.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSize%2A> is set to `true` and <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSizeMode%2A> is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AutoSizeMode.GrowOnly?displayProperty=nameWithType>, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.OnResizing%2A> performs all resizing tasks on the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: Si <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSize%2A> está establecido en `true` y <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSizeMode%2A> está establecido en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AutoSizeMode.GrowOnly?displayProperty=nameWithType>, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.OnResizing%2A> realiza todas las tareas de cambio de tamaño en la superficie de diseño de flujo de trabajo.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSize%2A> is set to `true` and <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSizeMode%2A> is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AutoSizeMode.GrowAndShrink?displayProperty=nameWithType>, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.OnResizing%2A> performs layout tasks, but no resizing tasks.
trans-unit.target: Si <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSize%2A> está establecido en `true` y <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSizeMode%2A> está establecido en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AutoSizeMode.GrowAndShrink?displayProperty=nameWithType>, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.OnResizing%2A> realiza las tareas de diseño, pero no las tareas de cambio de tamaño.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSize%2A> is set to `false`, all contained designers retain their previous locations on the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner>.
trans-unit.target: Si <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSize%2A> está establecido en `false`, todos los diseñadores contenidos conservan sus ubicaciones anteriores en <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner>.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme" /> that contains the updated theme property settings.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme" /> que contiene los valores de propiedad del tema actualizados.

trans-unit.source: Notifies the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" /> that its associated theme has changed.
trans-unit.target: Notifica a <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" /> que su tema asociado ha cambiado.

trans-unit.source: Unless overridden in a derived class, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.OnThemeChange%2A> always sets the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.Text%2A> property to an empty string and the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.Image%2A> property to `null` (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: A menos que se invalide en una clase derivada, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.OnThemeChange%2A> siempre establece la propiedad <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.Text%2A> en una cadena vacía y la propiedad <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.Image%2A> en `null` (`Nothing` en Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme.ShowGrid%2A> is set to `true`, the locations of each child designer in the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner> is snapped to the nearest grid line.
trans-unit.target: Si <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme.ShowGrid%2A> está establecido en `true`, las ubicaciones de cada diseñador secundario en <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner> se capturan en la línea de cuadrícula más cercana.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector" /> to remove.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector" /> que se va a quitar.

trans-unit.source: Removes the specified <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector" /> from the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" />.
trans-unit.target: Quita el objeto <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector" /> especificado de <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" />.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.RemoveConnector%2A> deletes the specified connector from the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.Connectors%2A> collection and calls the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.OnConnectorRemoved%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.RemoveConnector%2A> elimina el conector especificado de la colección <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.Connectors%2A> y llama al método <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.OnConnectorRemoved%2A>.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="connector" /> contains a <see langword="null" /> reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="connector" /> contiene una referencia <see langword="null" /> (<see langword="Nothing" /> en Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner" /> to resize.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner" /> que se va a cambiar de tamaño.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> that represents the new dimensions of the designer.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> que representa las nuevas dimensiones del diseñador.

trans-unit.source: Resizes the specified <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner" /> to the dimensions of specified size.
trans-unit.target: Cambia el tamaño de la clase <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner" /> especificada a las dimensiones de tamaño especificado.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.ResizeContainedDesigner%2A> sets new bounds for the resized designer and performs all required layout operations for the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner> on the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.ResizeContainedDesigner%2A> establece los nuevos límites del diseñador cambiado de tamaño y realiza todas las operaciones de diseño necesarias para <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner> en la superficie de diseño de flujo de trabajo.

trans-unit.source: `containedDesigner` must be in a child of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner> before you call <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.ResizeContainedDesigner%2A>.
trans-unit.target: El parámetro `containedDesigner` deben ser un elemento secundario de la clase <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner> antes de llamar al método <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.ResizeContainedDesigner%2A>.

trans-unit.source: If it is not, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.ResizeContainedDesigner%2A> throws an <xref:System.ArgumentException>.
trans-unit.target: Si no, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.ResizeContainedDesigner%2A> se produce <xref:System.ArgumentException>.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="containedDesigner" /> contains a <see langword="null" /> reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="containedDesigner" /> contiene una referencia <see langword="null" /> (<see langword="Nothing" /> en Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="containedDesigner" /> is not found in the <see cref="P:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner.ContainedDesigners" /> collection.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="containedDesigner" /> no se encuentra en la colección <see cref="P:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner.ContainedDesigners" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner" /> to set to the back of the z-order.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner" /> para establecer parte posterior del orden Z.

trans-unit.source: Sets the specified <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner" /> to the bottom of the z-order of the <see langword="FreeformActivityDesigner" />.
trans-unit.target: Establece el <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner" /> especificado a la parte inferior del orden Z del <see langword="FreeformActivityDesigner" />.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.SendToBack%2A> modifies the z-order for the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner> to display the specified <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner> as the bottom visible designer on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.SendToBack%2A> modifica el orden Z para que <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner> muestre el <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner> especificado como el diseñador visible en la parte inferior de la superficie de diseño.

trans-unit.source: You can use this method to display a designer at the bottom of the z-order when a user deselects it.
trans-unit.target: Puede utilizar este método para mostrar un diseñador en la parte inferior del orden Z cuando un usuario lo deselecciona.

trans-unit.source: `containedDesigner` must be in a child of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner> before you call <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.SendToBack%2A>.
trans-unit.target: El parámetro `containedDesigner` deben ser un elemento secundario de la clase <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner> antes de llamar al método <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.SendToBack%2A>.

trans-unit.source: If it is not, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.SendToBack%2A> throws an <xref:System.ArgumentException>.
trans-unit.target: Si no, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.SendToBack%2A> se produce <xref:System.ArgumentException>.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="containedDesigner" /> contains a <see langword="null" /> reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="containedDesigner" /> contiene una referencia <see langword="null" /> (<see langword="Nothing" /> en Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="containedDesigner" /> is not found in the <see cref="P:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner.ContainedDesigners" /> collection.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="containedDesigner" /> no se encuentra en la colección <see cref="P:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner.ContainedDesigners" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" /> draws connectors in the foreground of its design surface.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene un valor que indica si <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" /> dibuja conectores en el primer plano de su superficie de diseño.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" /> draws connectors in the foreground of its design surface; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> si <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" /> dibuja los conectores en el primer plano de su superficie de diseño; de lo contrario, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: El valor predeterminado es <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Unless overridden in a class that derives from <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner>, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.ShowConnectorsInForeground%2A> always returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: A menos que sea invalidado en una clase que deriva de <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner>, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.ShowConnectorsInForeground%2A> siempre devuelve `false`.
